BundledCareFeeAgreement.name: BundledCareFeeAgreement
BundledCareFeeAgreement.description: Specifies the payment terms for contracts of Bundled Care Fee Agreement.

BasicTierPrice.description: The basic tier price for the procedure bundle.

ContractPaymentAgreementId.description: The contract payment agreement record to which this bundled care fee agreement is associated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MidTierPrice.description: The mid tier price for the procedure bundle.

Name.description: The name of the bundled care fee agreement.

PremiumTierPrice.description: The premium tier price for the procedure bundle.

ProcedureBundleCodeId.description: The code of the bundle including a set of procedures.

ProcedureBundleDescription.description: The description of the procedure bundle.

ProcedureBundleItemList.description: The list of procedures covered in the bundle.
